name: PhiHair Balsam 250ml
description: Formulated as a rich blend of hair nutritive essentials, it acts like a moisture bomb restoring shine and smoothness, by closing the strand's cuticles, fortifying hair to fight signs of damage. The product provides hair follicles with multiple moisture boosters without a heavy residue settling on the strands, perfect for anyone who wants mega moisture, but hates feeling like their hair is weighed down. Ideal to keep the hair colour looking bright. With frequent use it will continuously improve hair's consistence.
